wikipedia_page.main: Ralph Jones  (born 1876) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match on 18 March 1899 against Scotland. At club level, he played for Druids.

response: Ralph Jones (1880–1951) was an American football coach.
Ralph Jones may also refer to:
*Ralph Jones (racing driver) (born 1944), American stock car racing driver
*Ralph Jones, main character in King Ralph
